SEARCH
Module graphicInterface
Package graphicInterface

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
graphicInterface.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class controls the game logic and UI interactions in the application.

  • Method Details

    • initNew

      public void initNew(int nbPlayers, int size) throws Exception
      Initializes a new game with the specified number of players and board size.
      Parameters:
      nbPlayers - The number of players in the game.
      size - The size of the game board.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during initialization.

    • initResume

      public void initResume(Game resumedGame, String saveName) throws Exception
      Initializes a game from a resumed state with the given game object and save name.
      Parameters:
      resumedGame - The game object representing the resumed state.
      saveName - The name of the saved game.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during initialization.

    • init

      public void init() throws Exception
      Initializes the game with the current state. The number of players is determined by the game object's player count.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during initialization.

    • init

      public void init(int nbPlayers) throws Exception
      Initializes the game with the specified number of players and board size.
      Parameters:
      nbPlayers - Number of player
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during initialization.

    • initBarriers

      public void initBarriers(javafx.scene.layout.Pane playersAndBarriersPane, double panePadding, long gridGap, double boxSize) throws BadBarrierEdgesException
      Initializes the barriers on the game board by creating and adding rectangles representing the barriers to the specified pane.
      Parameters:
      playersAndBarriersPane - The pane to which the barrier rectangles will be added.
      panePadding - The padding of the pane.
      gridGap - The gap between grid cells.
      boxSize - The size of each grid cell.
      Throws:
      BadBarrierEdgesException - if the barrier edges are invalid.

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame()
      Saves the current game state. If a save name is not already provided, prompts the user to enter a save name using a dialog. Serializes the game object using the provided save name and updates the saveNameGeneral field.
